title: House Lawyers to Ask Sondland About Efforts to Sway Ukrainians
text:
Gordon Sondland is set to be deposed Tuesday by House lawyers as part of the congressional impeachment inquiry looking into President Trump’s effort to press Kyiv for investigations of Joe Biden and other matters.

The U.S. ambassador to the European Union is expected to be questioned on matters including the role that he and other officials played in crafting a statement in August in which Ukraine would commit to opening a corruption investigation in exchange for a White House meeting between Mr. Trump and Ukrainian President...
description: Gordon Sondland is set to be deposed Tuesday by House lawyers as part of the impeachment inquiry looking into President Trump’s effort to press Kyiv for investigations of Joe Biden and other matters.
